body:
What do you think about this line?
I forgot to remove it in last commit. It adds possibility to use not-fp32-types with tf.contrib.slim.batch_norm and it also doesn't break backward compatibility. 
If you are working on batch norm and it's better to remove it from this pull request, please, add same line in your work.
